aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-8635-751 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Wiring harness insulation breakdown. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 18/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 20/07/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 20/07/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 21/07/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 25/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Wiring harness insulation breakdown. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
